results.code:
125 
126 def setup_api_gateway(
127     app: FastAPI,
128     redis_url: str = "redis://localhost:6379",
129     jwt_secret: str = "your-jwt-secret",
130     enable_monitoring: bool = True
131 ) -> APIGateway:
132     """Setup and configure API Gateway for FastAPI application."""
133     
134     logger.info("Setting up API Gateway...")
135     
136     # Initialize gateway components
137     gateway = APIGateway(app, redis_url, enable_monitoring)
138     cache_manager = CacheManager(redis_url)
139     response_cache = ResponseCache(cache_manager)
140     api_key_manager = APIKeyManager(redis_url)
141     authenticator = GatewayAuthenticator(api_key_manager, jwt_secret)
142     monitor = GatewayMonitor(redis_url)
143     
144     # Configure backend pools
145     _configure_backend_pools(gateway)
146     
147     # Configure routes
148     _configure_routes(gateway)
149     
150     # Add middleware stack (order is important!)
151     
152     # 1. CORS (if not already configured)
153     if not any(isinstance(m, CORSMiddleware) for m in app.user_middleware):
154         app.add_middleware(
155             CORSMiddleware,
156             allow_origins=["*"],
157             allow_credentials=True,
158             allow_methods=["*"],
159             allow_headers=["*"]
160         )
161     
162     # 2. Circuit Breaker
163     app.add_middleware(CircuitBreakerMiddleware, redis_url=redis_url)
164     
165     # 3. Rate Limiting  
166     app.add_middleware(RateLimitMiddleware, redis_url=redis_url)
167     
168     # 4. Caching
169     app.add_middleware(CachingMiddleware, redis_url=redis_url)
170     
171     # 5. Request/Response Transformation
172     app.add_middleware(RequestTransformMiddleware)
173     
174     # 6. Main Gateway Middleware (should be last)
175     app.add_middleware(
176         GatewayMiddleware,
177         gateway=gateway,
178         monitor=monitor,
179         response_cache=response_cache,
180         authenticator=authenticator
181     )
182     
183     # Add gateway management endpoints
184     _add_gateway_endpoints(app, gateway, monitor, api_key_manager, cache_manager)
185     
186     # Setup startup/shutdown handlers
187     @app.on_event("startup")
188     async def startup_handler():
189         await gateway.initialize()
190         await cache_manager.initialize()
191         await api_key_manager.initialize()
192         await monitor.initialize()
193         logger.info("API Gateway initialized successfully")
194     
195     @app.on_event("shutdown") 
196     async def shutdown_handler():
197         await gateway.shutdown()
198         await monitor.shutdown()
199         logger.info("API Gateway shutdown complete")
200     
201     logger.info("API Gateway setup complete")
202     return gateway
203

465 # Helper function for easy setup
466 def create_gateway_app(
467     base_app: Optional[FastAPI] = None,
468     redis_url: str = "redis://localhost:6379",
469     jwt_secret: str = "your-jwt-secret"
470 ) -> FastAPI:
471     """Create a FastAPI app with gateway pre-configured."""
472     
473     if base_app is None:
474         base_app = FastAPI(
475             title="API Gateway",
476             description="Production-grade API Gateway",
477             version="1.0.0"
478         )
479     
480     # Setup gateway
481     gateway = setup_api_gateway(base_app, redis_url, jwt_secret)
482     
483     return base_app
